name: Green Glows
description: This is one of the first arcade games I have ever made. I am planning on making a mobile port, but that will take a while to create. Give me feedback, I'm open to suggestions thanks! Your goal is to avoid all the falling spikes that fall from the top of the screen. You must last as long as you possibly can. If you ever feel overwhelmed remember to use power-ups you may have collected along the way. Most importantly have fun!
